Document Sources.Sourced Statement: According to the Tennessee Lookout's database, the Tennessee Association of Realtors is the sixth largest spender on Tennessee politics, having spent $6.5 million on lobbying, campaign donations and other political expenditures since 2009.
The Tennessee Association of Realtors has been Swann's top funder since the start of 2009, according to the Tennessee Lookout, giving him $18,750.
It has also given Boyd $11,500 since 2009, making it his No. 6 funder.
